person.name: Gérald Caussé
person.description: Bishop Gérald Caussé was sustained as First Counselor in the Presiding Bishopric of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on March 31, 2012. At the time of his call, he was serving in the First Quorum of the Seventy and in the Europe Area Presidency.
person.memberOf: First Counselor in the Presiding Bishopric
